summary: Skyrim Immersive Main Menu Replacer with spinning 3D logo.
descriptionHtml:
Skyrim Immersive Main Menu Replacer with spinning 3D logo.

Video Showcasing The Mod: http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=Csdu5JxAizA

Original Background Art: http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/41692/?

EDIT:
Music In The Video: http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=Dc-Lx0KMeXA

3D Model used from this mod: http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/46007/?

Thanks so much for downloading and endorsing this mod! It has officially made the front page of Nexus Skyrim! That's Amazing!
author: ReloadFX
